overview:
Managing Director and Co-Founder - Advanced Millennium Technologies : An Information Technology firm focused on Software Product Development.

Co-Founder - TAROBY. : An Email dashboard for Enterprises. The product introduced the concept of Team Inbox which help SMEs to manage your information overload and better email management.

An entrepreneur with a broad vision and strategic goals with specialist skill sets in identifying new business opportunities, crafting robust business plans, and enabling businesses to lift off the ground and successfully tap into the subcontinent’s immense talent pool.

A trusted friend for his business partners.
